name: Tank Battle: fc games
description:
Classic Tank Battle. Pro game for you!
Tank battle game's style,But with different implementation, it has some improvements.More Fun!!
Destroy all enemy tank to pass level and unlock next level.
If this player's base is destroyed or the player loses all lives,game over!!
Prepare the classic strategy game, prepare the tank war!! It might remind you good old days!!!

Features:
- Many different levels.
- You can choose level and don't need to start all over again.
- Support buying extra tools.
